text:
Amy Marie Yasbeck (born September 12, 1962 in Cincinnati, Ohio) is an American actress who works mostly in comedy movies. She played Elizabeth Stuckey in "Pretty Woman". She played Annie Young in the 1991 comedy movie "Problem Child 2". She has done some television work.
Yasbeck was married to actor and comedian John Ritter from 1999 until his death in 2003. Together they have a daughter, who was born on September 11, 1998, one year before they married.
